articles.title: Marcus Smith blocked from Harlequins return as England stars picked for Saracens - The Telegraph
articles.description: Quins 'confused and frustrated' after Owen Farrell, Maro Itoje, Jamie George and the Vunipola brothers all return for weekend derby
articles.content:
Harlequins have been left confused and frustrated ahead of this weekends London derby after they were barred from picking Marcus Smith, even though Saracens will welcome back five England stars.
